title: Baseband Hardware Design Engineer
summary: We live in a mobile and device driven world where knowledge of the physical world around us is needed. We are striving to create revolutionary Apple products and looking for skilled individuals to join us. If you are intrigued by creativity, partnership, and thinking of old problems in new ways, Apple may be the perfect environment for you.
description: This is an EE (a.k.a baseband HW) position in the Hardware Technology group of Apple. The role involves working on next-gen chipset’s Power/Digital/Clock management, driving development of schematics/layout, debugging HW/SW/Co-existence issues, and collaborating cross-functionally with various teams within Apple.
key_qualifications: BSEE and 10+ years of relevant industry experience, Expert in electrical engineering fundamentals, Experience with schematic capture, layout design and review, Experience with mobile platform system design and high-volume consumer electronics design, Experience with voltage regulators, high-speed and low-speed digital interfaces, wireless chipset, and more.
education_experience: BSEE and 10+ years of relevant industry experience
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $165,500 and $293,800 and is determined based on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, stock programs, educational reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, and more.
